description: ElectronMail is an [Electron](https://electronjs.org)-based unofficial desktop client for [ProtonMail](https://protonmail.com/). The app aims to provide enhanced desktop user experience enabling features that are not supported by the official in-browser web clients. It is written in [TypeScript](http://www.typescriptlang.org) and uses [Angular](https://angular.io).
author: https://github.com/vladimiry/ElectronMail/graphs/contributors
